interpretation: The "wheel of dharma" emoji represents the Buddhist concept of the cycle of life, death, and rebirth. It symbolizes the continuous flow of existence and the interconnectedness of all things. This card can indicate a need for acceptance of change and a willingness to go with the flow. It can also suggest the need to break free from negative patterns and embrace new opportunities. Associated keywords include karma, destiny, evolution, and transformation. The "wheel of dharma" reminds us that life is a journey, and we must navigate its twists and turns with compassion, wisdom, and an open heart.
